news.title: Course registration closes on the 15th of January, 2024
news.post: Dear Students The First Semester examination timetable for the 2023/2024 academic session (First Draft) is now available. Please find attached the timetable for your programme. The examinations will be begin from Monday, January 22 and you are required to attend all registered courses examinations.
